config.title: Header Style 07

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 13px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 600 14px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 13px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-07" /> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="row" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-8 header-panel-left" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-16 header-panel-right" /> <container name="header-panel-bottom" htmlId="header-panel-bottom" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-24 header-panel-bottom cdz-fix-left"> <container htmlClass="row" htmlTag="div"> <container name="header-vertical-menu-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-6 header-vertical-menu-wrap" label="Header Vertical Menu" /> <container name="header-menu-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-12 header-menu-wrap" /> <container name="header-search-wrap" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-6 header-search-wrap" /> </container> </container> </container> </referenceContainer>
<move element="logo" destination="header-panel-left" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="header-panel-right" /> <move element="minicart" destination="links.features.cart" /> <move element="links.features.cart" destination="top.links.features" after="authorization-link-features" /> <move element="store-language-currency" destination="top.links.features" after="wish-list-link-features" /> <move element="store-vertical-menu" destination="header-vertical-menu-wrap" /> <referenceBlock name="header-contact-link" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="wish-list-link-features"> <action method="setTemplate"> <argument name="template" xsi:type="string">Magento_Wishlist::link-style-02.phtml</argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock>
<!--referenceBlock name="utilities.sidebar.left" remove="true" /--> <move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-menu-wrap" before="-" /> <move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="header-search-wrap" /> <move element="top.search" destination="header-search-wrap" after="-" /> <move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> </body>
